Usage time nearly 4 hours for light usage. Fluctuates depending on what you are doing.\\n\\nScreen is clear and bright. Sound quality is fine.\\n\\nFairly light.\\n\\nThe Bad... \\n\\nAMD processor is a bit slow. When installing a program and using internet\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Good laptop for using the net and watching shows\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> at the same time there was a lag. So maybe not good for multitasking.\\n\\nNo separate numerical keyboard. So choose another model if you do a lot of calculations or numerical data entry.\\n\\nBattery is not removable. To get at it you need to unscrew the back and lift up the entire panel over the keyboard. Might possibly wreck it in the process. This laptop is probably not designed to last.\\n\\nMedia players: \\\"Films &amp; TV\\\" can't handle all formats, could use Windows Media Player or the superior VLC Media Player.\\n\\nComes with McAfee and Office 365 one month trial which I did not bother with.\\n\\nThe included Windows 10 is quite different to the Windows 7 I used previously. The Cortana app (which I did not activate when installing) is also included. Both apps would appeal to users of smart phones and tablets. I'd feel weird talking to my laptop. \\n\\nThis model was not on display at my local store. Not sure if this means anything. Maybe it is so awesome that is has to be hidden away to protect it. :-)</span>\\n                </p>\\n                \\n                \\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"datePublished\\\" content=\\\"2016-06-01\\\">\\n              </li>\\n              \\n              <li class=\\\"bv-review bv-review-grid-2\\\" itemprop=\\\"review\\\" itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/Review\\\" data-reviewid=\\\"81755263\\\">\\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"itemReviewed\\\" content=\\\"Acer 15.6&quot; Celeron Laptop 100-14IBY\\\">\\n                <span itemprop=\\\"reviewRating\\\" itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/Rating\\\">\\n                  <meta class=\\\"bv-ratingValue\\\" itemprop=\\\"ratingValue\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                  <meta class=\\\"bv-bestRating\\\" itemprop=\\\"bestRating\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                </span>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-ratingStars\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" data-alt=\\\"This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.\\\"><div class=\\\"bv-ratingstars-container\\\">\\n    <div class=\\\"bv-ratingstars-inner\\\">\\n        \\n        <img class=\\\"bv-ratingstars\\\" src=\\\"http://officeworks.ugc.bazaarvoice.com/0576/5_0/5/rating.gif\\\" alt=\\\"This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.\\\">\\n        \\n    </div>\\n</div>\\n</div>\\n                <div aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" class=\\\"bv-review-author\\\" itemprop=\\\"author\\\">Kloony</div>\\n                <div aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" class=\\\"bv-timestamp\\\">3 months ago</div>\\n                <h3 class=\\\"bv-review-title\\\" itemprop=\\\"name\\\">Surprisingly Good</h3>\\n                <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.</span>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Kloony</div>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">3 months ago</div>\\n                <p class=\\\"bv-review-text\\\" itemprop=\\\"description\\\">Being in IT, I come across many devices through work and have developed a sense of skepticism towards budget devices and I am not often pleased easily. As I was looking for a budget device to take with me on travels, I wanted something that is more functional than a tablet while not as big and clunky as a laptop, especially not with a mechanical hard drive where it could easily damage the data when chucked around the back seat of a car. So I came across this little gem, that not only surprised\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Surprisingly Good\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> me with it's price and good looks, but later found that the performance can match some of the laptops out there at triple the price. This was to be expected since the N3060 processor is a massive improvement over last years N3050. I was cringing at the fact that it only had 32Gb eMMC storage but I figured I can use a micro SD card if I needed more storage and beats a mechanical drive any day. Setting up was pretty straight forward, connected to my 5.0Ghz Wi-Fi without a hick up, signed into my hotmail account and it was ready to go within minutes. Curiosity got the better of me and decided to remove the bottom cover and take a closer look at the hardware. As I imagined, the processor and RAM were embedded to the motherboard so no upgrading options there, but to my surprise, there was an empty M.2 SATA slot allowing me to upgrade the storage with an M.2 SSD Drive and use it as a boot drive. Perfect! I can now enjoy 256Gb storage as well as boosting performance even further. Happy that I made the right choice, I can confidently recommend this laptop to anyone who wants a light, portable device with enough computing power for everyday use, just don't expect to play hardcore games on it. Minecraft, Roblox and other Store App games work surprisingly well. Battery life is good for about 4-5hrs and can be stretched further to its advertised 7hrs with the battery saver mode ON. The only downside is that the speakers aren't very loud, however the built in audio software allows you to adjust the equalizer all the way up providing decent loudness for watching movies.</span>\\n                </p>\\n                \\n                \\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"datePublished\\\" content=\\\"2017-01-11\\\">\\n              </li>\\n              \\n              <!-- Link to product page -->\\n              <li class=\\\"bv-learnmore\\\">\\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"name\\\" content=\\\"Lenovo ideaPad 100 14&quot; Celeron Laptop 100-14IBY\\\">\\n itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/AggregateRating\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"ratingValue\\\" content=\\\"5.0\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"bestRating\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"reviewCount\\\" content=\\\"1\\\">\\n                </span>\\n                <a class=\\\"bv-learnmore-link\\\" itemprop=\\\"url\\\" class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">This reviewer rated product 4 out of 5 stars.</span>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">RAJ1997</div>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">1 month ago</div>\\n                <p class=\\\"bv-review-text\\\" itemprop=\\\"description\\\">This laptop was just perfect for my circumstances. I was looking for a laptop that was Windows supported, had quite big storage (500GB), decent RAM size (4GB), small and light to carry around, pretty long battery life but most importantly, CHEAP! \\n\\nI wouldn't recommend it for gaming (evident because it's HDD and is quite laggy at times) but for general storage purposes, web browsing and word processing, THIS LAPTOP IS THE ONE!\\n\\nThought it couldn't get any better than that until I found out\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Laptop of AWESOMENESS!\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> that it was convertible and was touch screen! Usage time nearly 4 hours for light usage. Fluctuates depending on what you are doing.\\n\\nScreen is clear and bright. Sound quality is fine.\\n\\nFairly light.\\n\\nThe Bad... \\n\\nAMD processor is a bit slow. When installing a program and using internet\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Good laptop for using the net and watching shows\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> at the same time there was a lag. So maybe not good for multitasking.\\n\\nNo separate numerical keyboard. So choose another model if you do a lot of calculations or numerical data entry.\\n\\nBattery is not removable. To get at it you need to unscrew the back and lift up the entire panel over the keyboard. Might possibly wreck it in the process. This laptop is probably not designed to last.\\n\\nMedia players: \\\"Films &amp; TV\\\" can't handle all formats, could use Windows Media Player or the superior VLC Media Player.\\n\\nComes with McAfee and Office 365 one month trial which I did not bother with.\\n\\nThe included Windows 10 is quite different to the Windows 7 I used previously. The Cortana app (which I did not activate when installing) is also included. Both apps would appeal to users of smart phones and tablets. I'd feel weird talking to my laptop. \\n\\nThis model was not on display at my local store. Not sure if this means anything. Maybe it is so awesome that is has to be hidden away to protect it. :-)</span>\\n                </p>\\n                \\n                \\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"datePublished\\\" content=\\\"2016-06-01\\\">\\n              </li>\\n              \\n              <li class=\\\"bv-review bv-review-grid-2\\\" itemprop=\\\"review\\\" itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/Review\\\" data-reviewid=\\\"81755263\\\">\\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"itemReviewed\\\" content=\\\"Acer 15.6&quot; Solid structure. Not slow. High quality display.\\n\\nI feel pampered by having such a quality product at a fraction of cost I can compare with.\\n\\nProduct weight is not 0.6 kg (as mentioned in the spec) if grouped with the keyboard. It is 1.2 kg as mentioned in the manual found on Pendo site.\\n\\nThe spec says \\\"none\\\" to ports of USB 2.0 and 3.0 so I was under impression that everything USB on this machine is in mini size but actually there are two normal size USB\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Satisfied with the purchase...\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> ports (one on the keyboard, the other on the tablet) on top of one mini USB socket on the tablet.\\n\\nThe catalogue product somehow was not on display. Celeron Laptop 100-14IBY\\\">\\n                <span itemprop=\\\"reviewRating\\\" itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/Rating\\\">\\n                  <meta class=\\\"bv-ratingValue\\\" itemprop=\\\"ratingValue\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                  <meta class=\\\"bv-bestRating\\\" itemprop=\\\"bestRating\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                </span>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-ratingStars\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" data-alt=\\\"This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.\\\"><div class=\\\"bv-ratingstars-container\\\">\\n    <div class=\\\"bv-ratingstars-inner\\\">\\n        \\n        <img class=\\\"bv-ratingstars\\\" src=\\\"http://officeworks.ugc.bazaarvoice.com/0576/5_0/5/rating.gif\\\" alt=\\\"This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.\\\">\\n        \\n    </div>\\n</div>\\n</div>\\n                <div aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" class=\\\"bv-review-author\\\" itemprop=\\\"author\\\">Kloony</div>\\n                <div aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\" class=\\\"bv-timestamp\\\">3 months ago</div>\\n                <h3 class=\\\"bv-review-title\\\" itemprop=\\\"name\\\">Surprisingly Good</h3>\\n                <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">This reviewer rated product 5 out of 5 stars.</span>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Kloony</div>\\n                <div class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">3 months ago</div>\\n                <p class=\\\"bv-review-text\\\" itemprop=\\\"description\\\">Being in IT, I come across many devices through work and have developed a sense of skepticism towards budget devices and I am not often pleased easily. As I was looking for a budget device to take with me on travels, I wanted something that is more functional than a tablet while not as big and clunky as a laptop, especially not with a mechanical hard drive where it could easily damage the data when chucked around the back seat of a car. So I came across this little gem, that not only surprised\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-text-ellipsis\\\">... <button type=\\\"button\\\" class=\\\"bv-read-more-link\\\">\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-read-more-link-visible-text\\\" aria-hidden=\\\"true\\\">read more</span>\\n                    <span class=\\\"bv-off-screen\\\">Click to read full text of review titled \\\"Surprisingly Good\\\".</span>\\n                  </button></span>\\n                  <span class=\\\"bv-truncated-text\\\"> me with it's price and good looks, but later found that the performance can match some of the laptops out there at triple the price. This was to be expected since the N3060 processor is a massive improvement over last years N3050. I was cringing at the fact that it only had 32Gb eMMC storage but I figured I can use a micro SD card if I needed more storage and beats a mechanical drive any day. Setting up was pretty straight forward, connected to my 5.0Ghz Wi-Fi without a hick up, signed into my hotmail account and it was ready to go within minutes. Curiosity got the better of me and decided to remove the bottom cover and take a closer look at the hardware. As I imagined, the processor and RAM were embedded to the motherboard so no upgrading options there, but to my surprise, there was an empty M.2 SATA slot allowing me to upgrade the storage with an M.2 SSD Drive and use it as a boot drive. Perfect! I can now enjoy 256Gb storage as well as boosting performance even further. Happy that I made the right choice, I can confidently recommend this laptop to anyone who wants a light, portable device with enough computing power for everyday use, just don't expect to play hardcore games on it. Minecraft, Roblox and other Store App games work surprisingly well. Battery life is good for about 4-5hrs and can be stretched further to its advertised 7hrs with the battery saver mode ON. The only downside is that the speakers aren't very loud, however the built in audio software allows you to adjust the equalizer all the way up providing decent loudness for watching movies.</span>\\n                </p>\\n                \\n                \\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"datePublished\\\" content=\\\"2017-01-11\\\">\\n              </li>\\n              \\n              <!-- Link to product page -->\\n              <li class=\\\"bv-learnmore\\\">\\n                <meta itemprop=\\\"name\\\" content=\\\"Lenovo ideaPad 100 14&quot; Celeron Laptop 100-14IBY\\\">\\n itemscope=\\\"\\\" itemtype=\\\"http://schema.org/AggregateRating\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"ratingValue\\\" content=\\\"5.0\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"bestRating\\\" content=\\\"5\\\">\\n                  <meta itemprop=\\\"reviewCount\\\" content=\\\"1\\\">\\n                </span>\\n                <a class=\\\"bv-learnmore-link\\\" itemprop=\\\"url\\\" href=\\\"https://www.officeworks.com.au/shop/officeworks/lenovo-ideapad-100-14-celeron-laptop-100-14iby-sl14i100ss?rev=BVSpotlights&amp;cm_sp=Category_Landing_Banner-_-spotlights-_-Laptops\\\">read more</a>\\n              </li>\\n\\n            </ul>\\n          </div>\\n          <!--end-reviews-->\\n        </div>\\n      </div>\\n    </div>\\n  </div>\\n</div>\\n\\n<style
